sentences.english: Lily is a perfect food and drug resource, and its bulb contains rich starch.
sentences.chinese: 百合是理想的藥食兼用資源，其鱗莖澱粉含量豐富。

sentences.english: North American perennial having a slender bulb and whitish flowers.
sentences.chinese: 北美的一種多年生草本，鱗莖細，花帶白色。

sentences.english: Bulbs are underground plant stems. They provide food for a shoot.
sentences.chinese: 鱗莖是植物的地下根莖，爲幼芽提供養分。

sentences.english: The whole bulb is protected by scale leaves and adventitious roots arise from the base of the stem.
sentences.chinese: 整個鱗莖被葉片保護，不定根從莖的基部產生。

sentences.english: New taxa of the genus Corydalis sect. Elatae.
sentences.chinese: 標題中國紫堇屬鱗莖紫堇組的研究。

sentences.english: They stand straight up and thicken at the bottom to form a bulb.
sentences.chinese: 洋蔥垂直生長，並在底部增厚形成鱗莖。

sentences.english: During bulb morphogenesis, the activity and the number of isozymic bands of peroxidase increased.
sentences.chinese: 鱗莖發生過程中過氧化物酶活性及同工酶帶逐漸增加。

sentences.english: It's time to plant the bulbs.
sentences.chinese: 又到種植鱗莖的時節了。

sentences.english: But Mike Lizotte says a hardy bulb can stay in the ground all year.
sentences.chinese: 但利佐特稱，耐寒鱗莖植物可以全年種在地裏。

sentences.english: On Sunday, some of my neighbours were even out planting bulbs.
sentences.chinese: 星期天，我的一些鄰居甚至在外面種植鱗莖職務。

sentences.english: Bulblets arose from the bulb base between two scales.
sentences.chinese: 小鱗莖產生於兩鱗片之間的基部。

sentences.english: He rooted the tulip bulbs in potting soil.
sentences.chinese: 他把鬱金香的鱗莖種在盆栽用土中使其生根。

sentences.english: Lily bulbs were resistance waterlogging to a certain degree.
sentences.chinese: 蘭州百合鱗莖也有一定的耐澇能力。

sentences.english: Every autumn, throughout her childhood, we repeated the ritual of planting the bulbs together.
sentences.chinese: 她童年的每個秋天，我們都會按照慣例一起種植鱗莖。

sentences.english: A drop of water was cut in half by a plane passing through its bulbous front and tapered tail .
sentences.chinese: 平面將水珠的鱗莖狀前鋒和錐狀尾巴的分成兩半。

definition: Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 芡實|芡实[qian4 shi2]
